website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that looks nice and produces a lot of warm light, although care should be taken not to break the bulbs.
pros: Comes in a choice of several different colored cables
Very durable once you get them hung
Very attractive lights that give off a lot of warm light
cons: Much like the Brightech strings, the bulbs here are very fragile and should be removed during installation
Some buyers also note that the bulbs tend to burn out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looked wonderful. I purchased 2 boxes to decorate for a party I had, and 1 bulb from each box was blown, but since I didn't have time to return I used them with the 2 blown bulbs. The project was a hit, everyone loved the added touch. Update: I've changed my review from 4 stars to 5. The vendor reached out to me to see if my lights were received and if there were any issues. I informed them that 2 bulbs were blown, and they sent 5 replacement bulbs within a week. I'm very happy with my lights, and very satisfied with the customer services of the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: TechGirl

customer_reviews.title: Order, and ReOrder
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 boxes of these light sets now, the 25ft. I might just get the longer strand at this point. I love love love these lights. I will attach a photo at a later date, but these lights are gorgeous. They arrived, I plugged them in while in the package to make sure they all worked. Then i unscrewed all the bulbs to make it easy to hang. I hung them up all around my balconey using a staple gun. When I finished I screwed the light bulbs all in :) I would highly recommend these lights. They are PINTEREST perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: we are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife read that before you hang lights, you take out the bulbs. We have hung 3 strings, over our deck and pergola, without any light problems. All the 1 star reviews have had one or more light bulb blow out. We have had none, and at this point, we are very happy with our purchase..
customer_reviews.author: R T Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for lighting our pergola! I ordered replacement bulbs as well, and used black zip ties to attach them. Great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spilker

customer_reviews.title: Excelent! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product. Two key important things to keep in mind: Don't try to hang them before removing the bulbs, and don't connect more than three strands together. Highly recommend. Great product for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Devle86

customer_reviews.title: Fragile: here's a work around
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty and ridiculously fragile. I'm saying this after 40 years of stringing Christmas lights on very tall trees. My strong advice is: remove the bulbs from the lamp base. Hand or place your string of lights where you want them THEN put the bulbs in the sockets. Yes even if you have to get back on the ladder. Boring and a hassle I know but soooo much better than having one end release from the extension cord before it's securely tied/attached and crash onto the cement patio below.
customer_reviews.author: Francoise Brun-Cottan

customer_reviews.title: These lights are great!
customer_reviews.text: I will say, when I ordered these lights I was a little skeptical but thought I would try them. I was looking for something for my back patio that needed a little something. We sit outside a lot, grilling, roasting marshmallows, etc. I love these lights!! When I opened them, they were a little bigger than I thought they were going to be, but I put them up around my patio and they are perfect! If they were smaller it would not look right. I am adding a picture for you to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for My Wedding
customer_reviews.text: Used these to decorate for my wedding. They worked and looked great. All of the bulbs worked and there were a couple of packages that contained an extra bulb.
customer_reviews.author: EinsteinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2018 to replace some string lights on our deck and these have been great and have had no issues with th bulbs burning out. Matter of fact after washing the deck off to remove all the Texas pollen I've finally had a bulb burn out, the only problem it's been so long I can't remember where the heck I put the spares. I order a set of bulbs from Amazon but they only can in packs of 25. At this rate they'll last me a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi A. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: In the pictures, they make them look like amber bulbs, but they are bright white bulbs, nothing amber colored about them at all. So now that they are all up, because I didnt see the bulbs until all the wires were up, and the work was done, because the bulbs are in a separate box, now I have to spend extra money to buy amber bulbs. Not thrilled with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: So many complements on the lighting for our wedding!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our backyard wedding. I purchased 4 boxes and we strung them in our yard. We didn't have any issues with the fuses or the bulbs. I did take someone else's advice and removed the bulbs prior to hanging them up. The bulbs are small but they give off just the right amount of lighting. Aftwards they were easy to store in the boxes ready for the next event.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty in our deck. The light bulbs are a little thin glass material but other than that, it’s beautiful. You can’t beat the price anywhere else. Also as other reviewers said, you need to install the bulbs individually. Do the wiring first and then install the bulbs - saves you time and safe to do. They have male female parts so easy to connect more if you want. I’m planning to buy 25 ft so that I can have a criss cross section as well! All in all, it’s a perfect purchase. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Short life span lights.
customer_reviews.text: Nice while they worked. Used them less than 24 hours over a six week period and then one evening after they had been on 5 minutes, they just quit working.
customer_reviews.author: The Vertical Pen

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 weeks. I am beyond the return window as I did not install them for a few weeks after receiving them. Edit... I received a message from the seller saying there is a extra fuse in where the plug is and to change that out. I did that and it worked for a few hours and then stopped working again. Not sure why but it seems like the fuse keeps blowing. I have about three strands connected together any ideas or suggestions? As of now I have not been able to use them and I have paid for them plus paid somebody to install them.
customer_reviews.author: aky

customer_reviews.title: Pool patio paradise
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE LIGHTS. We used 150ft of lights and they are gorgeous. All my guest love them and gives a great cozy feel. At first we didn’t hang them properly so we broke about 15 but they come with extra lights so that helped. If you are hanging lights, use galvanized wire.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Night Lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are so beautiful and perfect for my little apartment porch.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Powell

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this seller and with the overall quality of these lights. I bought them twice, the first time they stopped working entirely after a couple months in the summer time. The second time, in the fall, almost immediately light bulbs started going out. 4 within the month. Now there are more dead bulbs than lit ones. The seller was so unhelpful and in general didn’t contact or respond and this made this annoying experience that much more frustrating. Overall, poor quality, bad seller, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.text: My first order was for two 50 lite strings. They were installed last year on the roofed porch in the white mountains. they wintered over with out damage. My second order was 1 - 150 lite and 1 - 50 lite string. These have just been installed ona roofed patio in Tucson. One light went bad the first day. I don't think 1 in 150 infant mortality is bad especially when they provide 2 spares per 50 lites. One fail in 250 if you count the two orders together!
customer_reviews.author: Row40

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: I have these lights on a timer. They come on at dusk and go off four hours later. The glow is pleasing and it lights up the driveway below my balcony. I also bought a box of replacement bulbs and a box of colored bulbs. For two months we had steady and strong rain here in Santee, Ca.. Not a single problem, rain was not an issue at all. Want to get another string of them.
customer_reviews.author: David Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and simple, completes the patio
customer_reviews.text: These lights were perfect for my patio, I've recieved plenty of compliments so far. The Edison light bulbs and beautiful and offer the perfect amount of lighting for any occasion...the clips were ideal for my eves, the over hang of the roof, which made for simple installation...Also here's a link capable of handling the 100ft required wattage SUNTHIN 650 Watts Outdoor String Lights Dimmer
customer_reviews.author: Brody Vins

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs do not seem to last longer than 2-3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs do not seem to last longer than 2-3 months when this product is connected to a dusk-dawn outlet. Perhaps this is the expected life of the bulbs when connected to this product, however I purchased a nearly identical product from Home Depot and I’ve bulbs have significantly outlast the length of life of the bulbs attached to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and I love them
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing in our yard I love them and my husband was able to hang them and string them with some copper poles and they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lepley

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the haters, these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've read the reviews. Take the bulbs out of the sockets. It will only sap 120 seconds from your life but if you do, and THEN after you've hung the wire replace them, it will work great. All bulbs worked and I even dropped the last one and it didn't break and it worked...I was nervous after the reviews and bought replacement bulbs and I'll keep them, but it wasn't necessary. Just take bulbs out before hanging wire. Simple and they look and work great
customer_reviews.author: Notpicky Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Too bright, not as warm as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.text: These are not exactly what I was hoping for. They look like they have a very warm, almost amber glow but they’re not that warm and they’re really really bright. They light up my whole living room on their own. I was wanting lights that would give a dim soft glow later at night. Great if you want bright lights. Edit: company contacted me about low initial review and offered a full refund! Great customer service even tho the product was not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some solar string lights we had on our gazebo. One string provides plenty of soft, warm light to sit around in the darkness of night and still be able to see our gazebo companions. Two strings would be too much light for our 12x12 sitting area. The clips on the back of each bulb are a nice touch and we were able to string the lights without using any nails, etc. I live in southern California where these items are more likely to die from sun exposure than rain. We'll see how they do.
customer_reviews.author: mysticfiction

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: The lights look good, but the bulbs tend to break way too easily. I broke three bulbs just stringing them up. So many broke I had to buy another string of bulbs to replace all the broken ones. Some just cracked and fall to the ground and splinter into very fine shards that are very difficult to see to clean up. We can no longer walk bare foot on our patio. And I cut my hand trying to remove the broken bulb and pick up the broken pieces. Not safe to have children around them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor evening lighting
customer_reviews.text: These lights are exactly what I hoped for. I ordered the lights to add some outdoor lighting by our bonfire pit at the cabin, and the lights are perfect. They came very securely packaged in a box with padding, and individually locked into a cardboard frame. The cardboard frame broke apart as I strung the lights up - the packaging really helped me get the lights up quickly and easily without ending up with a tangled mess. The set even came with two extra bulbs. The lights look great, and after being on all night, are not hot to the touch. We’ll be ordering more for the other side of the cabin yard.
customer_reviews.author: R. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great soft and romantic lights!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights!! Purchased them for my son’s wedding reception in our backyard, they were beautiful just the perfect amount light made our yard very romantic and enchanting!!! A company wanted to change a couple thousand $$ to hang lights!! So glad we purchased and hung these ourselves, they came with plenty replacement bulbs. They stood strong through several spring storms. Everyone raved how beautiful the yard was and the lighting was a huge part of that! You will NOT regret this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Hanging hooks are flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these lights - the shape and color of the actual lights are beautiful. They are lighter weight than some previous heavy-weight outdoor lights, which is what attracted me initially (I didn't like the thick black wiring with my last set). Unfortunately, around 20 minutes after we had hung these up in our screened porch, one of the hooks on the side of a light (used to attach to hardware in our ceiling) loosened and brought down half of the lights, most of which smashed on impact with walls or the floor leaving us with a porch full of glass shards. With dogs. Not fun at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: 23/100 bad bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and installed these a few days after receiving them. I broke 2 bulbs setting them down on the floor while I was attaching them to my cable... be careful they are literally easier to break than an egg. Also 13 of my bulbs just don't work. They look nice but keep in mind the first hail storm is going to probably wipe out most of your bulbs and you will also have to purchase extra bulbs to fully outfit a strand. Likely not worth the investment in hindsight. UPDATE: I had 10 more bulbs that were bad for a total of 23. No contact from the seller after leaving them feedback.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTS DIED ON DAY 1. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights and the first thing I did was plug them in to make sure all the bulbs worked and sure enough they did. I went ahead and unraveled them, set them up around the door way, plugged them in and nothing! I thought at first it might be the outlet so I removed them and moved to another outlet and again nothing. These lights worked for less than a minute! Im so disappointed! FYI... If you do a return it has to be send back within a small window or else SELLER WONT REFUND YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Susu

customer_reviews.title: Break Extremely Easily!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. One bulb broke while removing it from packaging and another broke when it tapped into the wood balcony I strung them around.. I plugged them in, there was a flash of light and then the whole string stopped working. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: mazzy422

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs burn out immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these and couldn't wait till our outdoor carpet was installed, new furniture in place before I put the lights up. They arrived beautifully packed. After screwing all the bulbs in place, I plugged them in to check if they all worked. Unfortunately, there were 3 initially out from the word go. After they were strung, within hours, one after another was burning out. I have 7 bulbs out and only 1 replacement was provided. They are really pretty but if the bulbs continue to burn out and they're brand new....I'd recommend buying them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Celestine Zambino

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY!  BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: We put these on a tree outside my husbands shed. The other evening he said they smelled something electrical and the circuit flipped. This evening I went out thinking it was a bulb or maybe small fuse but they plugs were fried! Both! The plug they went into was fine before so it's not that. I am REALLY glad these were outside and not inside!!! Will be sending pictures to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bz gardner

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly delicate!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are incredibly delicate! I was careful with hanging them up but the slightest knock broke two lights right away. The set came with 1 extra bulb, but that was not enough. The bulbs are break up into hundreds of small and very sharp pieces that are incredibly difficult to assemble. The lights have a nice warm color, but in they run very very HOT. As soon as you plug them in they are like the surface of the sun. I believe the outdoor lights should be more safe and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Galkina

customer_reviews.title: They look nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are smaller than I thought, but that's ok because they look perfect in my small covered patio. It adds just enough light when hung all around to allow for reading at night, or playing card games, but without attracting bugs (so far). I got some command string light sitckies and it holds them pretty well as they are very lightweight. I have them outside because it says indoor/outdoor, but I can't attest to how they do in the weather as they are covered. I like them for the price and would get more if I needed them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Meighan Warren

customer_reviews.title: Non working lights Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what we wanted. After checking the light and all were working we CAREFULLY hung the lights in a straight line around our Gazebo. Within three days over half of the bulbs stopped working. We had to replace all the bulbs since we were unable to match the existing ones to lights we bought at Home Depot. They work fine now and seem durable. We purchased four sets and by the time we replaced all the bulbs it ended up costing us over $50. We were in a pinch since we had a party the weekend after they arrived so no time to go through the return process and customer service never responded to us.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Very breakable
customer_reviews.text: They look great when you plug them in. Finally got around to hanging them and two lightbulbs shattered from crashing into each other. There air pressurized so it sounded like a gun went off and glass went flying everywhere in every direction. Lights still worked- thought great I can get some replacement bulbs third one broke blew a fuse even though it didn’t shatter this time and now the whole string won’t light up, which according to the product details they’re suppose to still light up even if some go out. Huge bummer. Waited till after the return window to hang so now I can’t return, unsure of how to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Atmospheric
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, work outdoors, have weathered quite a bit of Colorado snow, hail, rain, sleet, etc. without missing a beat. They can support their own weight, and have a perfect lighting that both makes outdoors more visible at night, but isn't so bright that it messes with the ambiance. I went through a few different versions of this before finding this brand, so if you're shopping around, give these a try. A few bulbs have gone out (in places safe from the weather), so it seems the bulbs are not as high quality as the actual wiring/insulation. I might look into getting lower-light LED bulbs or something for this in the future that won't go out for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mopsy

customer_reviews.title: Overly fragile but cute
customer_reviews.text: Two of the bulbs broke immediately and the string comes with lights already on it making it very hard to handle. They were cute, but the packaging (ie already having bulbs on vs putting on after string is up) means more likelihood of broken bulbs- otherwise very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea F

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I opened the package and saw the size of the bulbs. I used them on an outdoor party tent as the only source of light and they were PERFECT! Not bright enough to attract millions of bugs, but more than enough to see what we were doing. I broke one bulb while attempting to hang on the tent, but luckily there was an extra!! And they never got hot, so I wasn't concerned about the bulbs that were touching the plastic tent material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile for outdoor lights
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this strand believing it was a previous / other, more durable brand. When this arrived, two bulbs already did not work (but it came with replacements, so I replaced them). The bulbs are very thin glass, and upon hanging them, one of my supports let go of the wall and ten bulbs shattered. My experience with outdoor lighting in the past has been that it's been very durable and has lasted years, so this was very disappointing. I threw the whole thing away the day I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marsh

customer_reviews.title: You have to install all the globes
customer_reviews.text: All the globes you have to manually install. It came up in a solar light search so I purchased. It’s not solar. You plug it in. Even if it was I would have returned bc I can find ones that you don’t have to manually install the bulbs for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my patio two summers ago and I love them. I put them up in the spring and take them down when it gets too chilly to sit outside. I can’t say how they hold up in the cold temps of winter. But what I can say is that I love these, they are small enough that they don’t hang down too far and they give off a nice relaxing glow, not too bright. We had a tree fall on our patio last summer and I though for sure they would be ruined but they held up great, I only lost a handful of bulbs. Once these wear out I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Danika Ehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two strands for my classroom. Let me tell you, they are amazing!! I loved them so much I got a third strand to complete my classroom. They are the perfect about of light to create a soft relaxing atmosphere. I do use two other lamps if we are working on any kind of reading or writing. If they students are on the computers or I am just working at my desk, my main lights stay off and these give me enough to see! They are packaged great and I didn’t have any issues with any strands tangling or any bulbs breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Blew out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used these lights twice and that is including the day that I set them up on my patio and used them for 30 mins. I liked the look as it gave my patio the look I was going for but they blew out wayyyy too fast. By the 3rd time I went to turn on the lights, I had multiple bulbs blown out and had to send them back. I requested a replacement at first but then canceled that since my husband surprised me and just installed a wall patio light. So overall they are cute lights but they are not durable and won't last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Evening Lights
customer_reviews.text: We use these on our fence line for both evening decoration and night time security. They are extremely well designed for any form of outdoor use. If using more than 4 strands, I would encourage running an extension cord per 4 strands of lights.
customer_reviews.author: TMAN

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights in October of 2019. We put them up for a party and they have been up since then. We live in Texas so the weather here can be crazy. I am happy to say they still look great. We just had two bulbs go out this month which is pretty impressive considering the crazy weather we've had. The light bulbs are a little dim but its a nice subtle shine to enjoy. You could always use brighter bulbs but I think that would defeat the purpose. Super happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby V

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, seems unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights to use in our backyard since they were labeled for outdoor use and I liked the smaller size than most outdoor "edison-style" string lights. Unfortunately, they are very flimsy, easily breakable, and the bulbs get really hot really quickly after being plugged in. I wouldn't feel safe using them anywhere where they come into contact with trees, house siding, etc. I could see these working well for a one time event where they are hung between two poles and don't come into contact with anything else. Not a good pick for something you want to use regularly. Also the bulbs break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i’m really dissapointed. they came in today and one light was already out now 3 are out 😩. it only came with one extra. i have a very small apartment patio and thought this would be long enough but i’ll either order more or just buy some that are worth it. also, when i first plugged them in they were instantly hot! they get super heated super fast! like rediculously hot. the wire is thin and cheap but that’s what you get for the price. i guess i’ll just have to buy new bulbs or new lights al together
customer_reviews.author: zoe carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Party Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I have these lights hanging outside over my patio. They are very bright but not overly bright like spotlights and are perfect for lighting up the backyard for parties. We keep them up all year long during rainstorms, hot weather, and snowstorms and they still work like the day I bought them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Look's great, performs horribly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this string of lights to use in my dorm room. I thought these would be the best, and to be fair they did look pretty cool. But after about three weeks of use (at three hours a day so, 63 hours), three bulbs and a fuse have burned out already. I didn't expect these lights to be such low quality, that they can't be used much. I HIGHLY recommend NOT buying these. Pros - Looks great - Bright Cons - Bulbs burn out quickly - Fuses burn up - Super fragile/thin bulbs (not suitable for outdoor use)
customer_reviews.author: CadeOrade

customer_reviews.title: These emit too much heat/one bulb already out
customer_reviews.text: These seemed too cheap to be true. $15 for 25' string lights?! I wanted these to go around our patio, they would be strung through foliage. These emit so much heat I'm afraid they would cause a fire!!!! Not only that but when I opened the box, one of the bulbs is already out!!! Returning all three packages for something else.
customer_reviews.author: themamacurd

customer_reviews.title: The glass on these lights is paper thin. They ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass on these lights is paper thin. They were breaking from tapping my wood railing and each other as I was very carefully hanging them . :-( The ones that aren't broken are cute. Oh, and one of the strands I ordered didn't work. I still have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Myla

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Have had them up for about 9 months and they work great. They are so light weight i didn’t feel the need to have the metal cable running with them. They have not stretched or sagged. At 1 watt each i feel goof about using them. The light is warm and pleasing! Really lights up the yard nicely. Btw- i used eyelet screws and zip ties to secure them, and it worked great. A few bucks at hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very bright nice mood lighting
customer_reviews.text: These string lights emit as much as a lamp would. I got them for my boyfriends bedroom so we wouldn't have to constantly use the hideous florescent light. They're super bright but not in an obnoxious way. They have a really pretty warm glow to them. They're brighter than christmas lights or firefly lights. I'd definitely get these again for mood lighting in a living room, or outside patio. They were packaged so well too, every individual bulb in their own little slot to prevent cracking. Overall, highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Touch to an Old Deck
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to beautify my deck. Gives great light and has withstood the rains so they are definitely waterproof. Lights do tend to get warm so I suggest mounting them in hooks instead of laying directly on surfaces. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Quality - big thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought a couple strands of these lights about 4 years ago and they were great. Bulbs still work, weatherproof, only one bulb casualty over the years I’ve had them. So I decided to buy a couple more strands. Quality has REALLY gone down since then. These bulbs are made of paper thin glass. Tap it just right and the bulb explodes (2 have already busted on me the first day). And when these things shatter, it gets everywhere! You’d think you broke 10 bulbs. And since the glass is so thin, it sticks to everything. I was picking pieces off me all day. Really disappointing. I know they’re priced well, but they aren’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sad
customer_reviews.text: Two bulbs went out on the first day. There's only one replacement bulb. Pretty annoyed, not gonna lie. Just went to replace one bulb and now the entire strand stopped working. Definitely don't have enough bulbs for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think the recent storm on the east coast was going to be as severe as it was. I had strung the lights among trees in my garden a few weeks ago. They are truly beautiful when lit. Fortunately the cords and lights didn't sustain any damage from the multiple fallen limbs due to heavy gusts. However, next time a near hurricane is on it's way, the lights will be taken down to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Witwer

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights back in August for the outdoor patio of our new home. Didn’t get a chance to put them up, but thought it would be fun to hang them indoors for NYE. Tried hanging them and one of bulbs burned out, killing the whole string. It was very upsetting to for these to die while using indoors. I couldn’t imagine using these outdoors, may start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but brightness not uniform and one bulb dead already on day 3
customer_reviews.text: They look great, come packed exceptionally well, and are actually really bright, so recommend a dimming plug if you want a more "romantic" look. However giving this 3 stars for two reasons: 1. Whether dimmed or at full power, bulb brightness is not uniform from one bulb to the next. Not a huge deal, but definitely noticable. 2. 3rd of using these for about 1-2 hours/day, so max 6 hour use, one bulb is dead already. This leads me to believe the bulb quality is not great. If you get this, grab some spare bulbs and don't expect each bulb to glow uniformly.
customer_reviews.author: Edrock200

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and experience
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE. I used these for indoor lights to add some decor and upon arrival a bulb was already shattered before I even hung them up. I contacted Amazon wanting a refund and they would not (very disappointing because I have high expectations for Amazon) so I left them up and within a week or so 4 of the bulbs already went out. I am very disappointed with the overall quality and experience of this purchase. Save yourself the time and money and purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding some light and ambiance to an outdoor space
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a lot of homes around me with led lights hanging in front of their homes or off of their back porches/decks. They look nice and add some light. I bought these to add some light to my back deck with out relying on a big bright spot light or adding additional light sockets/rewiring everything. They have held up in the rain and look great. I’m happy with the performance and look of the lights
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs are different than
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are smaller than the leftmost bulb shown in the main picture. The picture was taken with forced perspective to make the bulbs appear larger than they are. They are also not shaded at all as implied by the photo - they are completely clear. Buyers should know that the lights come (of course) unassembled. When screwed in the bulbs are slightly recessed in the sockets, which may provide some modest water protection if hanging down as shown in the graphic, but otherwise I would not guess these would be any more water or rust resistant than any electronics left outdoors. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Seatac_prof

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Switched these on to find 3 didn't work. Of the ones that did work, bulb color / brightness varied between bright white and a more yellow / orange glow (think Edison bulbs), which of course looks ridiculous. In the 2 days since I've had them, 2 more bulbs have stopped working so I'll be returning these and purchasing another product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dunk

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Great
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with a remote BUT it still works great! The light is warm and bright. We used it to light our upstairs balcony and it works amazing! The bulbs are on the small size but they make up with the amount of brightness given!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Break easily, cheaply made, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I read other reviews and it’s a mixed bag pending these lights really work.I opened the box and after plugging in all the lights and the strip, the fuse broke. Had to replace that with the extra they give in the plug. Then the lights fell, and 2 light bulbs broke. Cleaned that up, rehung it up, and then plugged it back in for more electrical problems to happen. Where the initial light bulbs broke, the socket still didn’t work despite new bulbs. So currently, we are 5 bulbs out (thankfully all next to eachother by the plug) and just not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gianmarco Petrelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice string lights!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set of lights and everything seems well crafted. They weren't too difficult to hang up, but it was a little time consuming. Overall the effect from the lights is really nice! They let off that perfect glow that's bright enough to see what you're doing, but not so bright as to be distracting. Really looking forward to spending some warm evenings outside with these lights!
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Costly, Fragile. Invest in LED instead!
customer_reviews.text: They work but I definitely regret my $17. They would be perfect if gravity does not exist because straight out of the box, two bulbs slightly touched and cracked immediately. And yes I took caution and handled them with care but still. Another bulb suddenly we t out after a slight touch to the wall. They also get hot extremely fast and the string is super heavy to hang with command strips. I bought these for my dorm and it took me 12 hooks and 2 hours just to hang 1 string. Never ever buying these again please save yourself money and buy the LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: What remote control, if that was supposed to be a feature then I did not receive that! Brightness is ok, I did not buy these for lighting as much as I did for “mood and ambience” for our backyard parties. I already have a 75 foot higher lumens globe string for lighting so this was good for what I wanted them for. Weatherproof is yet to be experienced, they have only been up a short time although it has rained 2 times since & all still working ok
customer_reviews.author: mudhen7

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but bulbs don’t last
customer_reviews.text: I love how these lights look, but the bulbs continually burn out after 3-4 months. I replaced a strand on a small deck in November and now half the bulbs have burned out. Bought a large box of replacement bulbs, but this does nit look like a one time problem. I have bought 4-5 strands and replacement bulbs, but looks like I have to look at other alternatives for upcoming summer.
customer_reviews.author: Children's Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with nonfunctional bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Tl,dr; Would not recommend- lights do not work. Try another brand. As soon as I opened my first box, one bulb fell out and shattered. No problem, I thought! The box comes with an extra. I screwed in the extra only to find out 2 other bulbs were not lighting. Over the course of a few days, 5 other bulbs stopped lighting. I tried unscrewing and screwing back in with no luck. Amazon sent me a replacement, but the replacement has 2 bulbs that don’t work. getting tired of setting up and taking these down and returning to UPS only for them not to work again. I can only imagine what these will be like after a month of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. 6 months and more than half of the lights have died.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. 6 months in and over half have died I bought these and were hopeful they would last like my potter barn lights- those dates for 10 years!! These lasted less than 6 months and 3/4 of them are dead. I could probably replace all the lightbulbs but i bought 4 strands and have 70 lights that need to be replaced- so it is more economical to just buy new strands. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle & Matt Harp

customer_reviews.title: Very delicate
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars instead of 5 because the glass is paper thin... Very Warm white.. cozy... Wire so soft and easy to work with.. Broke a bulb while putting them on my porch!! Comes with 1 extra bulb🙂 I saw a review that suggested taking off bulbs before hanging to avoid breaking!! But I was in hurry and didn’t!! I recommend doing that!!!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs look nice at night and have clips that make it easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for solar LED lighting for backyard lighting. Somehow I ended up with these and I purchased them without ready the details, my mistake. The bulbs look nice at night and have clips that make it easy to install. The bulbs are very fragile and out of the box several bulbs were not working. They give you one extra bulb per strand so I would recommend ordering extra bulbs with your order.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Yoga

customer_reviews.title: lasted only 6.5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I’m coming back to review these since they just stopped working for me. I have had them for about 6.5 months. They seemed like great quality when hanging them, but the other day, they just didn’t turn on. Completely burnt out, the entire string. These were a cheaper option than most and for only 6.5 months of use, i can now see why. Won’t be reordering and will be looking for a new brand to replace with, sadly. **UPDATE** after reading through reviews i replaces the fuse with the extra that is included. it did turn the lights back on, but 6 of the bulbs are still out. so i’m leaving this as a 2 star review.
customer_reviews.author: daniellemarcee

customer_reviews.title: Glass bulbs packed very well
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! Just as expected! They were packed with care! How many blondes does it take to screw in 100 lightbulbs? 2 and in 10 minutes after they were hung. Fumbled 2 lightbulbs but caught them before the glass could break on the ground. Even if they did break...they packed an extra bulb for every box of 25! I love my new backyard lights!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 of these, broke a few bulbs (my ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these, broke a few bulbs (my fault since I kinda banged them around on a glass patio table while I was hanging them). Very cute. One pack was easier to open then the other. The first box had an insert that had perforated strips so the box ripped away strip by strip. The other was not perforated an required unscrewing the bulbs to separate the string from the cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w/Burnt out Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These lights are pretty & packaged well, but when I plugged them in IMMEDIATELY after receiving them, there were 3-4 bulbs burnt out on EACH string (I bought 4 strings). And as I was stringing them on our outdoor metal railing, two went out after bumping LIGHTLY against the metal. I've already had to cannibalize one string to make sure the two that are up are fully lit; and I have a feeling that none of the strings will make it through the Christmas season. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cjn

customer_reviews.title: Good set, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Lights were packaged well, nothing was broken and every bulb worked. I didn't unscrew them before installing but I did tear the protective cardboard at the perforations one row at a time while hanging so I didn't risk dropping the rest. I hung them around the porch using Command Outdoor sticky tape hooks as another reviewer recommended. Happy so far but no idea how long the bulbs will last. Will look to replace with LED bulbs as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. D'orazio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs, but blow out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for the first few functions I used it for - concerts, parties, etc. Unfortunately, it is now three months in and after occasional use (a couple of hours, ~10 times a month), the bulbs are all dead. I don't know how this happened, as for a while there were 2 that were burnt out, but then some days ago the entire chain stopped working. I am very disappointed at the shelf life of this chain, as it is a beautiful accessory for decoration but sadly very short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wolfson

customer_reviews.title: They Look Lovely
customer_reviews.text: We just redid our patio and decided to add lights to brighten it up a bit. The lights along with the new furniture and indoor/outdoor rug we got transforms our patio into something that anyone would want to hang out at for hours on end. They have the perfect amount of brightness and adds a lot of character to our little space.
customer_reviews.author: Norah_Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect screen porch lighting
customer_reviews.text: Wanted less bright than the clear bulbs and these are perfect. Like that clip is on socket so I don't have to use the wire. That does cant them toward the wall but I can live with that. One burned out bulb. Packaging was annoying, but fantastic for protecting bulbs. Good trade off. Plus by having to unscrew all the bulbs it allowed me to change the color order.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferStPete

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Me! Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these lights in a wedding registry. So happy that I did. After I ordered them for the Bride and Groom, my wife suggested we order some for ourselves and put them on our outdoor patio wall. Hung them up in minutes, and they made my license plate collection “pop” in a mild manner from the reflective properties in the plate. Nice little glow, looks great, functions perfectly! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive these despite the mixed reviews. When I finally got the chance to open the box, I was very pleased with the aesthetic of the lights. It was then that I noticed one of the bulbs was broken. I was a tad bit off put, but I decided that I would just buy replacement bulbs separately. However, when I tried to plug them in, all of them shorted out right away, leaving me with a pair of useless lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price but they bulbs shatter easily.
customer_reviews.text: They are bright bulbs, but the are glass and break very easily. I am trying to get in touch with the seller to see if I can replace the glass bulbs with plastic or shatter-proof bulbs, but the email I sent was kicked back. I noticed later that they do sell a version of the string lights with plastic bulbs for a higher price. I would have purchased those if I had seen them at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable!
customer_reviews.text: Very good outdoor lights! The bulbs are a bit smaller than I thought they’d be, but they are very bright. Had no idea, but these bulbs are dimmable! A quick purchase of an outdoor dimmer and now I have full control over brightness and scheduling from an app. Good price, great quality. Dimmable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazombie

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright lights! Yard looks a bit smaller in pic but it’s very long and i thought the 100ft wouldn’t light it enough but it does a great job. I love in Cali and it goes over 110 degrees very often and haven’t had a problem. Hasn’t rained yet. Does not come with a remote. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Not working :(
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these lights, I ordered 50 ft at first, and then needed to order another 25 ft, to complete the outline of my backdoor patio. The lights shipped super fast both times, and although you have to hang everything and then screw all the bulbs in, I’m sure if the lights worked it would look really nice. Unfortunately none of my lights turn on. I checked to see if it’s my outlet, and it’s not. The outlet definitely works. The lights themselves are not working for some reason. Hopefully the seller can send me new ones to make this experience better because I don’t want a refund, I really just want my lights to work.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Classic looking lights
customer_reviews.text: These things delivered exactly what I was looking for. I have some similar pairs that are LED, and they eat a lot less power, but they just don't have the incandescent charm. These are incandescent with glass bulbs, so the look and glow is perfect. Yes you have to be a bit more careful then plastic/led combos, but this is worth it. Fingers crossed they last
customer_reviews.author: Amazone Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights are warm white and work as described. Its been a month on the deck and they seem to be holding up well. Had a couple of bulbs not working straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eternalsands

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and just what our patio needed. We bought two packs actually! They are a bit smaller than I thought they would be but are still super cute! They come with one extra bulb in each pack- which is good for breaks. THIS IS A TWO PERSON JOB- they will break if they drop or blow off hooks. We ended up electrical taping them to the hooks so they won't blow off with heavy winds. They have held up well through our weird weather where we live. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but breakable.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to string around my EZ up tent at the farmers markets and street shows. They're decently bright, very cute, and overall great for the price! Just remember you have to treat them like they'll break if you even breathe on them too hard! My husband isn't allowed to touch them because he always breaks a bulb or two when he does! I have a delicate touch and a great hanging system (after some practice) and never break a bulb. Treat them as well as you would some antique china and you'll be golden!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased twice.Lights do not last more than a week...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why but I purchased these lights twice and both times same thing happened. I used them indoors to light the hallway. look so pretty but they went ALL dead for no reason. I suspect there is something to do with the little fuse that comes with; they blow up easily. I even spent $3. at the hardware store on an extra fuse and only a few of the lights from one row turned on. Overall, pretty but not worth it. Buy something else with better reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Great quality so far especially for price!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Look amazing. Been in lots of bad weather, including tropical storm winds & hanging strong. I was looking back at outdoor stuff & came across these that I had purchased & couldn’t believe I had paid so little for the quality and how amazing they are! Don’t even hesitate! Buy them! I bought and we got busy and they sat in box probably 18 months, but have held up great outside as of now... only few months.
customer_reviews.author: H. N. Lombard

customer_reviews.title: They work OK, but they came with broken and burned out bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: This string of lights came with 5 broken bulbs and three bulbs that were burned out. We needed them for a party and didn't have time to return them for new ones, so we had to move some bulbs around to hide the ones that were broken. Would have liked them much better had they come with all the bulbs working.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t bring a remote control? Didn’t know it was suppose to bring one. Anyways- i have the same Lights on my balcony. Decided to purchase another strip and put them along my exposed ac vents. I also purchased a dimmer so these are dim for mood lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Great patio lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on Amazon Day and they are nice. I do highly suggest that if you want to run these across a gap, you will need a guide wire kit. While these lights are as expected, I would not trust pulling the cord itself very tight. The bulbs will also turn the wrong way if they don't have something to mount them to. I have had them for about a month now and using an Alexa enabled outdoor smart plug running a timer program, they seem to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Love These for My Patio
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set of lights. Not sure why the review includes anything about a remote control. There was no remote control however there was an extra bulb which was nice since these shatter easily! Each light also has a fixture to allow you to hook it onto things which is crazy convenient and allows you to get creative with how you decorate the outdoor space. Lots of length too!
customer_reviews.author: mikesocial_pr

product_meta.title: Brightown Outdoor String Lights-25Ft G40 Globe Patio Lights with 26 Edison Glass Bulbs(1 Spare), Waterproof Connectable Hanging Light for Backyard Porch Balcony Party Decor, E12 Socket Base,Black
feature_bullets: 【Dimmable Compatible & Energy Saving】G40 outside string light come with 25 glass bulbs and 1 spare bulb. 1.5 inch light bulbs have E12/C7 candelabra socket base, 5W per bulb, warm white dimmable string light help you to save more electricity bid.

【Connectable & Portable】25 hanging sockets, 6 inch lead with male plug, 12 inch spacing between bulbs, 6 inch tail with female connector, total length 25 feet. End to end connect up to 3 strands. Portable size for easy carrying and storage

【Safety & Durable】UL certified deck lights is built with weatherproof technology, which can withstand extreme temperatures, rain, wind, and damp climates. Safe and durable electric bistro lights either with a built-in spare fuse for easy replacement

【Practical & Easy to Install】This outdoor decorative light string is very easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere as you need. flexible and practical, a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulbs

【Widely Used & Warranty】Our commercial lights great for balcony garden pergola gazebo tent bbq market cafe umbrella wedding decor. Please contact the seller directly if you have any quality problems. For Bulbs replacement, please search B00R25V92Y

specifications.Special Features: Waterproof, Connectable, Patio String Lights, Adjustable
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars7,953 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
